lines.text: [Frank is using Sam as a shield as Noelle aims a gun at him]
Did you do it for Noelle, or for the money?
Ahh! You hit me, you bitch!
Sorry honey, but I did it for the money.
Looks like she fucked us both.
Yeah. Hey, you want her back?
Can I be frank with you? You couldn't turn me on if I had a switch.

[jumping in his lap]
Is she cuter than me?
Much, much cuter than you. But your teeth are sharper.
That fucking bitch was out of line.

[to Frank]
You non-conformists are all alike.
